ldeg |kun tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug cing bsil yang thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob
cing | bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni rgyu'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /don gyi dra ba dang / chos kyi dra ba dang / tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /de bas ni tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba 'di
ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon
par bstod do// //bar gyi sdom ni/ rtag dang gcig pu rgyu med dang / /mtha' lan de bzhin lha mi spong / /'du shes 'du shes med can dang / /chad dang mya ngan 'das pa dang /
dmyugs dang kun nas rmongs pa dang / brten dang reg pa dge slong dang / rgyu dang don chos 'dra ba ste/ the ma tshangs pa'i dra ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzogs so// //rgya yi skad du
de'i phung bya na ph+hur po'u in kyeng sU phim de'i a+yir/ bod skad du/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab ba'i mdo/ bam po dang / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ldeg slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya
pa byas pa/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ klu chen po ltar sems kyi dbang thob pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor
dang | kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / mdzes bzang dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / lam chen brtan dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / kun dga' bo dang / sgra
gcan 'dzin las sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dag thabs gcig ste /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad stong tshad med pa rnams la rtag tu sangs par spyad pa/ smon lam
chen po yongs su rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong snyed khong du chud cing rtogs pa/ gzungs yongs su rdzogs pa/ snying rje chen po mi gtang ba/ sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin
thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'jugs pa/ so so'i skye bo'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i
bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ ye shes chen po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun tu grangs med pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dbyangs dang /
byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po
dang | byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' khams
gsum 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od can dang / byang chub sems
dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshod med dang / byang chub
sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa
brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos rnams thogs shing lha rdzas kyi rol mo dkrol nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do/ /de ma yin pa lha dang / klu
dang | gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / de la sogs pa so so nas
'khor brgya stong snyed lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongs su
bskor te/ rim gro dang / mchod pa byas/ bkur sdi dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas/ mthar gyis bsod snyams blangs so/ /de'i dus na bram ze pha ma la sre zhu cher byed pa/ khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa/ chig rkyang ma rgan khur
du khyer te mthar gyis slong mo byed de/ de yang kha zas zhi ma po ro dang ldan pa'am/ shing rtog bzang po dag snyed na/ pha ma la stobs so/ /kha zas ngan po ro med pa'am/ shing tog skam
po dag rnyed na bdag rang za'o/ /kun dga' bos de lta bu dag ma thong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ mi de la legs so/ /legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas/ rigs kyi bu/ pha
ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste/ legs so zhes smras so/ /de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa gcig dbang po rno la gtsug
lag dang / rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa dang / skar ma dang / rtsis la mkhas pa/ dge sdig gi ltas rno ba/ mo dang / gtsug lag gi rigs pas pha rol gyis sems shes
pa| pha la mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa/ kun gyis bkur ba gcig lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas/ khe dang / grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos
dang / dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de/ smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma shaka rigs kyi bu nga ni dge pa yin te/ yon tan chen po
dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de/ bden pa'i dngos po med do/ /khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te/ btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na
ma yang shi bas sdig can yin par mngon no/ /rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las/ pho brang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non to/ /sems
'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor te/ zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de/ cho nges btab nas nga'i lha'i bu gcig deng du stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du dus nas nga'i yul
dang / srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang bar zad la bu yang khyod gcig pur zad na ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chas zhes smre sngags 'don du bcug pas/ khyod kyi ston pa go ta
ma drin mi shes te/ ci la yang ma ltas par langs te song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no/ /yab rgyal bos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyang chung ma'i las ma
byas te/ mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na/ khrel med pa yang yin par mngon no/ /kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas/ ngo tsha zhing skyengs te bsod
snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam/ sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di skad du
zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/ lha'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pas bstan tam/ 'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa
dang | kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag la lha'am/ klu'am/ yi dwags sam/ mi'am/ mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te/ snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i
shul du/ ston pa drug gi 'khor kun tu rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang / bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o/ /zhes rgyas par gsol to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad
nas| zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung bas/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi
khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DU R+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re 'ur bris pa/
rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin
tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/
yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri
ka dang / pA ru sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na
bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yed du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing
longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza'
khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal bar bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo krung du
bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun
par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba
dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyi reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang / sems bde bar gyur pa de thugs
brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas nub phyogs yongs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med ba bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba
yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas /
'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi
phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rdu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing
brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur
du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya
mtsho las dgrol ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pha ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems
dpa' 'khor mang po'i ston pa dang gtso bor gyur pa/ stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs
te| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu
gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med
pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa
can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi
dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang
yongs su ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das des thog mar de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /
ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo / /de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang / gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen pos
kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing /
rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang
las ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag
btsal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'od ces bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas mtshan mar dgongs zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa| dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston
pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+ya las byas pa/
gser btso mas thig re 'u ra bris pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab
mas brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu
yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog bad ma
dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / pA ru Sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam chu'i steng
yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems
can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal bar bkram pa'i khri de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
ma dgongs skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer kha dog bzang po/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
dang / dkar por ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di/ byang phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams
cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur par thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /
legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas byang phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol
na| sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs
su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor
mang po thams cad thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log
par lta ba'i zug rdu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing / brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan
bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ so
so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang / ston
par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin
gyi rlabs kyis/ bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen
po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rigs kyi bu dag /khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes
bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bya ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen pos smon lam
'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/ ri dang / shang shong dang / g.yo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas
su| sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med lnga dang / mi dge bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du
sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing / lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces
smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs
pa dang / ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin
du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang na ba der song ngo / /de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang / gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po kun tu snang bar gyur/
steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas
shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi
bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal te sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi
mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re 'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang
tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas
mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas
bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / pA ru sha ka dang / de ma yin pa me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna
bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod de/ rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams
nas| rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la
de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar
te| thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po/ kha dog
sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs su 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar
gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa thams cad lus dang / sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zungs shig dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas shar phyogs
logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen
po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyin/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rdu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir /
sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa
gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams
cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang
bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang / ston par gyur pa/ stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig
tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas
drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
kyi bu dag /khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes
bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam
'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa
yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang / bde ba'i don
du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar
gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas
nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/
mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang / gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen
po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab po/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing
rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma
dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ sangs
rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od
zer gyis byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so//
'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad+mo leb rgan gyi 'od ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral
ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi be DUR+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re 'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing
bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan
pa 'byung ba/ sgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su
gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhir bsung dam pa/ dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / pA ru sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog
sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na bya sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin
to| |rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na/ seng ge'i khri mtho khyad
dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis
char par bkra ma pa'i khri'i thog na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo leb rgan gyi 'od chags pa/ skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba
brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu ci'i
rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / /dmar po dang / dkar po bcas pa dang ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag
la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang / sems bde bar 'gyur ba thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis
bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang / khyed la dgrol zhing bshad
par bya'o/ /'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs
rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang
po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi
zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub ci yang sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems
can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pham la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir
'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang / ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur
nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa
chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyi brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka'
ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba
spyad pas/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang /
gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa| mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas dar
mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing
lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab bas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams
der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang / gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams
de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / ma nad ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du bab bo/
'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya
stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags
nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og gi
phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ra
der lhags nas/ mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su
bstod do/ /de ltar sangs rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su dag par gyur
te| ri khrad khrod dang / ri chen po dang / chung du dang / gtsang po dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / shang shong dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na
gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos
phyag btsal te/ mig mi 'dzum par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la
lan bdun bskor nas/ dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad the tshom skyes par sems kyis rab tu
shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang / phyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba dang / so so'i skye bo
thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las brgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag la pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing
shes par bya ba'i phyir stan las langs nas/ gos tshags su bcos nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zham 'bring na mchis nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la
nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na 'khor mang po'i the tshom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa
chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las
byas pa'i pad+mo'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig sa de nyid nas byung bar gyur
to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/ pad po de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/ /de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon
par bstan to/ /sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgya stong snyed bstan to/ /gzugs rnam pa de re re la
yang sku'i tshogs sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i phye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to/ /gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i
bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan/ /rdul phra rab nyid kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/ /rdul phra rab nyid kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/ nam mkha' dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can
gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /deng de bzhin gshegs
pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal bar bya'o/ /chos la tshig tu bzod pa med mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs
mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang / ming med pa'i chos la ming dang / mtshan mar bstan par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i
tshe| bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/ sems can
thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/ pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin
tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / mig dang / klad rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang /
ban glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang / theg pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad
gang yang ma btang ba med do/ /shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa byas pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang /
shes rab spyod pa nas/ spyod pa dka' ba thams cad spyad de/ skyo ba dang / ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang / drin shes pa
dang | drin lan bsab pa dang / sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i
sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas
spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang / mi 'bying ba dang / mi
rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin
tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang /
tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang / so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas/ gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor nub
par gyur to/ /phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to/ /mi bden par kun tu rtog pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa
la rtag par lta/ mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzir te/ skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa lnga
dang | kun nas glag pa bcus kun tu glags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang / tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang / cir
'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan to/ /so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so/ /tshig la chags
pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las mthun pa thams cad bsdus so/ /de ltar las mthun pa kun 'dus pa 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs
par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing / so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do/ /de bas na de
bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar gshegs/ dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so/ /skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa
mdzad do/ /skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni
bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/
bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad
kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na/ sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do/ /sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs
rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/ de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do/ /gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na/ mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo / /de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i
mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ /de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bskyed nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i
sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang skal ba dang mi ldan pas ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo / /
de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad/ skabs cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shin tu dpag
par dka' ba/ shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/ ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba spobs par gyur/ khyod kyis zhus pa
'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas/ lha dang / mi'i lam btod pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/
ngas da khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par bya yi/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon byung ba bskal ba
tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ yul wA ra NA sir sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/
'jig rten gyi gtso bo/ lha dang / mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa
chung ngu nyi shur gnas so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi'i rgyal po rA dza zhes bya ba 'jig
rten du byung ste/ yul wA ra NA si la dbang sgyur ro/ /rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod do/ /bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal
phran drug cu la dbang / grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/ rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/ gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na yul wA ra NA si'i rgyal po
de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te/ rtag tu yang drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas/ gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do/ /rgyal po'i bsod nams dang / yon
tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te/ lo tog rgyun du legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do/ /de'i tshe na wA ra NA si'i rgyal po de la blon po nag po sgra
gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la/ 'di lta ste/ ban glang gi tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / rta'i
tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/ wA ra NA si'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do/ /de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa
bzhi bkye nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu rab kyang bsad do/ /de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung gi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams so/ /
rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge ba/ dul ba/ 'dzum zhing smra ba/ smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don tu smra zhing
'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa/ rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ log pas mi 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/ longs
spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa/ bar snang gi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis
kyang dga' zhing bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan
pa| sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de
la yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so/ /de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po/ mkhyen tam/ blon po sgra
gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te/ rgyal po yab kyang dkrongs/ dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas/ rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te/ dmag
gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na/ rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing gud du mi 'gro /de'i tshe na rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lus kyi
ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang cung zad sangs te/ dal gyis
nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/ bdag
ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan bcas pas drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas na bdag gis
sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so/ /de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig
tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so/ /yang 'di snyam du bsams so/ /yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do/ /lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin
par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/ ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te pho brang gi phyi rol
tu phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas/ rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te/ mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing dngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go /de'i tshe na
btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ci'i slad du 'jigs shing
skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu skra yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am /
dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol/ rgyal po smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma
yin gyi/ ma smra zhig /btsun mos gsol ba/ bdag dang / rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na/ bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa
gnyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa/ khyod mi shes sam/ blon po sgra gcan
ngan sems skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'khus te/ yab rgyal po yang dkrongs te/ gcen rgyal bu gnyis kyi srog gi bar chad byas nas/ da lta dmag dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ongs
pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas/ rgyal bu dge don bang du blangs te lam du zhugs so/ /de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo / /de'i
tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/ lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa yang rtsub pa chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du
ma zhig song song ba las rgyags kyang chad do/ /thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor/ mi
gsum gyis kyang zos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las/ rgyags kyang chad nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas ngus so/ /
kyi hud/ kyi hud re sdug /thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba da 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo la
brdabs so/ /sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to/ /bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on
te pha ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab bam/ 'on te mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang / nya pa byas
sam| 'on te srang dang / pre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig gu /
de skad smra zhing cung zad bstir ni dgras slebs na/ srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen
nas srog la bab tu cha'o/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste dus pa dang / sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas ring zhig lon pa
dang sangs nas 'di snyam du/ gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyi/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang / bu'i srog thar bar bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral
gri phyung ste btsun mo gsad par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to/ /yab rgyal pos
mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyis srog gso snyam mo/ /gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar
'gyur te/ kho bo ni 'chi'am/ gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir/ khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na/ de'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te/ gang na yang ma'i sha la bu za ba mi srid pas/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur
na| yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha ma'i srog thar par mi mdzad/ yab rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ mod la khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la
'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kho po'i mig dang 'dra na su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste za bar byed/ kho bo ni shi yang sla bas bu mi gsod do/ /bu bsad de sha za mi nus so/ /de nas rgyal bu
dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs par rul sums nas dgongs pa ma mchis par
'gyur te/ bdag gi gsol pa gcig cig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal
bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas/ ci gsol ba rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yab yum
gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re zhing bdag gi lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab yum la dbul/ gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na/
lus srog gi zungs su 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas/ nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gsum du bgos nas/
cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang / btsun mo za/ cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/ lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song song ba las zhag gnyis
kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de/ rus pa'i tshigs dang / chu ba tsam zhig 'brel te/ srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to/ /de nas
rgyal po dang / btsun mos rgyal bu pang du blangs nas/ skad chen po phyung nas cho nges chen po btab ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /nged gnyis kyis ma rig pas khyod kyi sha zos te/ khyod
'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang da dung ring bas khyod kyis lus kyi sha ni zad de| da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro bzhag go /de nas rgyal bu
dge don gyis skad chung dus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da ni 'di nas pha rol du zhag gcig tsam gyis lam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus
pas srog 'dir 'dor ro/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsungs shig /bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar
dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ da dung yang bdag gis rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par gtogs la yul pha rol tu
gshegs su gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du tshigs dang / rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa zad par btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ cha gnyis ni rgyal
po dang / btsun mos zos/ cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang gis zos te/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo / /rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin rgyal po dang
btsun mo song ba la lta'o/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo gnyis skad chung nas ngu bzhin song nas/ rgyal bu dge don gyi mig gis mi song kyi bar du rgyal po dang / btsun mo la chags pa'i sems
kyis mig mi 'dzum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to/ /sha dang / khrag gi dri bro pas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal bu
yo ga pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'jus te/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de/ skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du
btab bo/ /bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig /deng slan chad mi bgyid do/ /bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te/ sbyin pa byas pas
bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang / lhas bsrung ba dang /
mis bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / dgra dang / rku lto byed pa med cing / dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog cig /bdag gi
lus lhag ma tsam sha khrag sbrang ma la byin pas thams cad du 'drangs shing tshim par gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su grub par shog cig /sangs
rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang chos kyi skus thams cad kyis bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang / skye shir 'khor ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog cig /rgyal bus de
skad smon lam btab pa na/ gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ nyi ma yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/ gcan gzan dang / ri dwags rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug /rgya
mtsho yang rab tu 'khrugs/ ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg /sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yas so/ /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams
kyi lha dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu dge don bsdigs pa'i phyir/ seng ge dang / stag dang / 'phar sbyang las sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig
bsgrad/ kha gdangs/ spu bsgreng nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung ste/ rgyal bu la mchong ba bzhin bsdigs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal bu dge don gyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong
nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo zhig /'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas brgya byin
lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng ge'am/ gcan gzan ma yin te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/ khyod bgam zhing sad du 'ongs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin
lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgu rangs par yang gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtong dka' ba btang ste lus kyi sha khrag gis
pha ma la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'on te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po'am/ mi'i rgyal po'am/ 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po'am/ tshangs pa'am/ lha'i rgyal po'am/ mi'i rgyal po'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi
'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu yang gti
mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dga' pas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ce'o/ /khyod kyis shin tu sdug
bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ de nas
rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te bdag gi smra ba'i chig rdzun te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang
'tsho bar ma gyur cig /gal te smra ba'i tshig bden na bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/ lus kyi rma yang snga mkho bzhin sor chud
de| khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang / mdzes par gyur te/ langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos
phyag byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so/ /shin tu legs so/ /shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thog mar bdag gis don mdzad par gyur

cig ces smras nas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po dang / btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po des kyang rgyang
ma nas bsu nas/ dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i tshe rgyal po dang / btsun mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod
pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar brjod pa de dag thos nas/ rgyal bu des lus gyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas dmag rnam bzhi
bshams nas/ rgyal po de dang yul wA ra NA sir dmag drangs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa
dang | 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na/ bu'i rus ba tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bkur ro snyam du bsams nas/ skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i
rus bu sdud du song song ba la/ rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu lus kyi rma yang sos nas/ sngar bas kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so/ /de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te/ khyod
da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang / btsun mo la smras so/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/ thams cad ban glang la zhon
nas| phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams kyi mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas/ rgyal bu don grub rgyal
por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go /bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems
na| de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa
de ni gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de
gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang
por gyur pa de ni da ltar kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub
sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu
gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/ /gzhan yang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems
spangs te/ theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas/ theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par
gyur to/ /lha dang / mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za
dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag
gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir lus kyi sha dang / khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing / shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no/ /'khor
mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ so so nas phan pa dang / bde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' mgu rangs nas mgo bos phyag btsal te/ g.yas phyogs
nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo / /thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// //thabs mkhas
pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan
pa lta bu 'am/ klu 'khyil ba'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la lta na mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsam na yid 'phrul ba tsam du 'od zer lham me lhang nger bzhugs te dper
mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyis 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang pa'am/ nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang brgya byin gyis drung na sol phung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin
la 'od gsal ba yod kyang / tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma lta bu 'am/ mtshan mo dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam
mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i
phung po ltar gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /
de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na/ dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur bo ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams
pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang / nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad
dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thams cad kyis skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis
de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang / byang
chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' zhig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyings dang / byang chub sems dpa'
grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug phud 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang / byang
chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang / byang
chub sems dpa' rab tu mtshan med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang / byang chub sems dpa' khro zhi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
srung 'gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang / byang chub sems
dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral 'chad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam du med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs
pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang / byang chub
sems dpa' dpag med chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang
phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang
chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang / byang
chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu
'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang / byang chub sems dpa'
'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang /
byang chub sems dpa' seng ge btsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus tshod rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid
mngon ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len byin dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rgyal ba byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan
dang | byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med dang / byang
chub sems dpa' ma chags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i
dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun nag bsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs
pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad bcas so/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das
pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag
cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos par
'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par
'gyur bas thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gis phan pa dang / bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran phas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du
shes skyes so/ /byams pa'i pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin shes par bgyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dam pa'i
chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang chos
thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal ba
de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gis lus bsrungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing / snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur
thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed do/ /sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis
sam| gsum mam/ bzhi nas/ bdun cu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang / mnam zhing btsog pa dang bral bar
'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag cing / lus dri zhim pa dang / thams cad yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/ /kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab
tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed
pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang /
bdag dang / gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang / bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i ba shes gnyen
la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyi chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid la byed cing / don bzang po gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems
dang | nyung du thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag nyid la dad pa'i sems dang /
de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye
bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas sems
can thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod
pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang mang dang / grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang / srog
gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do/ /ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom
dang | ban glang dang / shing rta dang / theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing
rim gro byed do/ /gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus
dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam
pa sring mo'am/ chung ma'am/ slas la gzhan gyis mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang / pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na/ mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag
phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang / srog
yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang / phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o/ /ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du
sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang / lcag dang / chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems
can rnams la mi 'tshe'o/ /ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / brtags pa dang / bcing bas bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi
dga' ba bzhin du sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang / srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / bzung ba dang / bcing
ba la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do/ /ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom btsan byed pa snyems shing ngan du
byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang / srog yal yang / tshul bzhin ma
yin pa'i mi rigs pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed do/ /ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba
ba la dga' ba bzhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / bde ba'i yo byad
thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do/ /gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig bsgrub bam/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ chos kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don bsgrub pa
las blos mi lcogs te/ don bsgrub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis/ bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma
grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig /khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya ste/ don yid
bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las
kyis grogs bya'o/ /ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pas bzung ngam/ btags sam/ bcings
na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/ snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag
la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig /khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang
khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o zhes zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par
bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang / bzo'i bar du yang mthar phyin par brtson 'grus su slob bo/ /'di lta ste/ shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang / rol mo
dang | rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang / sman dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag drang ba dang /
dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas/ 'gro ba mang po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa yang
bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa/ gzhan yang / longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam/ nor ram/ zas sam/ bza' ba'am/ btung ba'am/ nor bu'am/
gdu bu'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ bai DUR+ya'am/ byu ru'am/ man shel lam/ spug gam/ mu tig gam/ asma ga b+ho'am/ nor bu rin
po che'am/ ban glang ngam/ rta'am/ theg pa'am/ bran pho'am/ las byed pa'i mi'am/ chung ma'am/ slas kyang yod/ chu mig gam/ khrus
kyi rdzing bu'am/ rin po che'i yang tog bzang po'am/ longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la rlo ma pa'am/ rgyags pa'i sems
med do/ /de ltar rgyu rtsal kun la yang mkhas/ rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/ ban glang dang / rta dang / theg pa yang yod/ na chung bzang mo yang grangs
med par yod/ yang tog bzang po yang yod/ chu mig dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/ de la ma chags te rtag tu 'dod
pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa la dga' zhing / bas mtha' dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung du bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa la mos so/ /skye bo mang po
dang smra zhing gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do/ /so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul mthun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor
bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyi/ sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do/ /gang dbul ba phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong
du 'ongs na/ de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do/ /sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen
bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang / g.yog byed cing / rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/ lus bkru ba dang / mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang / phyag dar
byed dam/ so shing dang / khrus chur sbyor ram/ mal stan 'dings shing / mal gos spug pa'i las byed dam/ srod dang / tho rang sa la mar me 'bud dam/ khye'u sus dang / dro
la kha zas tha na pa na dang / pu she ni dang / kha da ne 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang / bu lar sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / kha ra nag po'i chu la
sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas/ yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nam/ zhag dug bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa'
de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas
kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la
