rlung dmar chen po langs nas/ lha khang dang / mchod rten dang / khang khyim dang / shing sdong po chen po bsgyel na/ yul khams su gnod pa chen po 'byung / ston zla ra
ba'i ngo rgyu skar A shwi ni'i nyi ma la/ thog bab bam/ skar mda' ltung ngam/ sor ba bab na/ yul khams der 'thab mo chen po 'ong / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar ma
g+hA'i nyi ma la/ char pa bab na/ yul khams thams cad kha zas mod par 'ong / dgun zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar A dra'i nyi ma la/ gnam me'i kha dog 'dra bar gyur na /
ltas rab tu ngan te/ yul khams su mi bde ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / dpyid zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NA'i nyi ma la/ byang phyogs nas sgra chen po
byung ngam/ gnam ser por song na/ dgra thams cad kyis yul khams bshig par 'gyur ro/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar swa ti'i nyi ma la/ char bab la rlung
ma langs par 'ja' byung na/ grong khyer chen po mes tshig par 'gyur ro/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pu Sh+ya'i nyi ma la/ glog dang / sbur ma dang / nyal nyil gyi char
bab na/ yul khams der mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar mU la'i nyi ma la/ char cher bab la 'ja' byung na/ rgyal rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ dbyar
zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar ut+ta ra b+ha dra pA dA'i nyi ma la/ sa las sgra byung ngam/ rlung nag po langs na/ yul der mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo phyogs mtshams dag
nas sgra chen po byung na/ yul phyogs der khrag khrug chen po 'byung / ston zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i nyi ma la/ gnam las sgra chen po byung na/ btsun pa dang / dka'
thub can rnams la gnod pa 'byung / ston zla ra ba'i ngo dbang po'i nyi ma la/ gnam las sgra byung na/ mi le lo can dang / phyugs la gnod pa 'byung / ston zla tha chung
gi ngo rgyu skar d+ha ni Sh+ThA'i nyi ma la/ gnam las rol mo'i sgra byung na/ rtsa dang / lo tog legs par 'gyur/ char dus su 'bab/ mjug tu mi nad 'byung / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo
rgyu skar swA ti'i nyi ma la/ gnam las sgra chen po 'byung zhing / gnam 'khrug na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / dgun zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar dz+ye Sh+ThA'i nyi
ma la/ 'tshub ma langs shing sa g.yos na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / dbyid zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA b+ha drA pA dA'i nyi ma la/
nyin par sa g.yos na/ lo gnyis kyi bar du dus su yul khams der dmag 'od/ dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA shA D+hA'i nyi ma la/ sa
'gul na/ blon pos rgyal po bsad pa dang / yul khams der 'khrug pa chen po 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar mU laM dbang pa la/
nub mo sa g.yos na/ khams kyi dbang po rnams la gnod pa 'byung / dbyar zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar ro hi NI dbang po la/ nub mo sa g.yos shing / rlung dmar byung /
char ma bab na/ 'bru zan ma rung bar 'gyur zhing dmag 'ong / ston zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar ut+ta ra b+ha drA pA dA'i nyi ma la/ nyin par sa g.yos na/ pha rol gyi dgras rgyal po
de pham par 'gyur/ yul phyogs kyang chom rkun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ ston zla tha chung gi ngo rgyu skar kArti ka'i nyi ma la/ sa g.yos na/ grong khyer chen po dang / khang
khyim 'jig cing mu ge 'byung / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar a shwi nI dang / ut+ta ra phal gu NI dbang pa'i nub mo sa g.yos na/ byis pa chung ngu dang / bud med sbrum
ma la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / dgun zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar mr-i ga shi rA dang / pUrbA b+ha drA pA dA'i nyin par sa g.yos na/ rkang 'gros la bgegs dang / gnod
pa 'byung / dbang po'am/ ma g+ha'i nyi ma la gtsug lag khang sku gzugs g.yo zhing 'gul lam/ sa 'phos na yul khams der myur du 'jig par 'gyur/ gtsug lag khang
gi sku gzugs gdan las 'phos sam/ dngul lta bu byung ngam/ 'gyel na/ yul khams de rgyal po dang bcas par rgyal khams gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur/ gtsug lag
khang gi sku gzugs 'phos sam/ spyan nas mchi ma byung na/ yul khams de'i mi dpa' bo gces pa bu smad dang bcas par yul byung bar 'gyur/ gtsug lag khang
gi sku gzugs gdan las 'phos sam/ 'gul la/ lha khang nas dud pa 'dra ba 'byung na/ yul khams de'i rgyal po la gnod par 'gyur/ gtsug lag khang chen
po dang / gnas khang lta bu g.yos na/ grong khyer de phyogs rgyal khams gzhan gyis gnangs su bcad pa'am/ mes tshig par 'gyur/ zla ba'i zur la gza' phur bu
byung na/ mi phyug po la rgyal pos nor 'phrog cing / gnod par 'gyur/ nyi zla dmar por song na khams kyi dbang po la gnod pa 'byung / gza' spen pa zla ba'i steng du byung
na| yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po dang / bgegs 'byung / ltas 'di rnams byung ba'i dus su zla ba gzas zin na/ rgyal po chen po rnams la gnod pa dang /
bgegs 'byung / rgyal po dang po skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi steng du zla ba byung zhing / zla ba'i steng du yang gza' mjug ring byung na/ yul khams
de'i rgyal po dang / rgyal khams nye ba gzhan gyi rgyal po dang 'thab mo 'ong / gza' spen pa rgyu skar ro ha NI dang / kArti ka'i dbus su shar na/ rgyal khams de'i mi
thams cad la gnod pa chen po dang / bgegs byung nas mi sum cha gcig lus par 'gyur/ gza' pa ba sangs dang / rgyu skar ma ga dang / pUrbA phal gu ni zla
ba'i dbus su shar na/ lo tog la gnod pa 'byung / gza' phur bu dang / pa ba sangs dang / spen pa rnams dmar por song na/ yul khams der 'jigs pa
chen po 'byung / gza' mjug ring rgyu skar pu Sh+ya'i steng du shar na/ ring por mi thogs par phyogs bzhi nas dmag chen po 'byung / gza' phur bu dang / mig
dmar rgyu skar shra ba NA'i steng du shar na/ lo gsum gyi bar du yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po dang / gnod pa 'byung / gza' phur bu dang / spen pa rgyu
skar bi shA kha'i steng du shar na/ mi mang po 'thab mo la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha khang dang / khang pa chen po'i steng du bya rog gar byed cing 'phyang mo nyug na/ yul
khams der 'thab mo chen po 'byung / bud med la mi ma yin pa'i bu byung ngam/ yang na phyugs la mi'i bu byung na/ yul khams de'i bud med la bgegs
dang | gnod pa chen po 'byung / ma'i mngal na bu yod pa rgod dam/ smra ba'am/ ngu na yul khams de 'jigs par 'gyur/ bud med kyi mngal na bu rkang
gcig pa'am/ rkang gsum pa'am/ rkang bzhi pa 'byung na/ yul de'i rgyal po chen po la gnod pa chen po 'byung / bud med kyi lto nas bu ma ning mtshan
gnyis pa byung na/ yul khams de'i rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ bud med las byol song gi bu dang / bu mgo mang po can byung na/ yul khams de 'jigs par
'gyur| |bud med las bu mgo gcig la gdong gnyis/ mig gsum pa byung na/ yul khams de myur du 'jig par 'gyur/ bud med las bu grul bum mgo bzhi
pa byung na/ yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / bud med las bu phag gi gdod can byung na/ phyogs bzhi nas yul khams de 'jigs par 'gyur/ bud
med las bu gdong nyi ma'i 'od bzhin 'bar ba byung na/ nang 'khrug gis yul khams de 'jig par 'gyur/ byis pa tshem bu na gnas pa chen po bzhin tshig smra
na| yul 'khor de 'jig par 'gyur/ ma nyid kyis ma tshor bar mngal nas bu byung na| yul khams der gegs dang / gnod pa chen po
'byung | bud med kyi lto nas bu phag gam sbrul lta bu byung na/ 'dre gdon dang / bgegs nad kyis yul khams de 'jig cing | 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / bud
med las bu skye nub pa dang / so skyes pa byung na/ yul khams dgon par gyur te/ mi thams cad kyang phyogs gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bud med las bu mgo
med pa lag pa gcig pa byung na/ yul khams der gnod pa chen po 'byung / yul khams su me tog dang / shing tog 'bras bu lan gnyis 'byung zhing /
shing dang / 'bras bu las khu ba 'dzag na rgyal po'i rgyal tshab la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / dus ma yin par bza' shing las me tog dang / 'bras
bu skye na/ rgyal po dang / yul mir bcas pas yul bor bar 'gyur/ bza' shing gi 'bras bu lhag par mdog bzang por gyur tam/ yang na khrag 'dra ba 'dzag na/ yul
khams der 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad dang / mu ge 'byung / skyed shing gi grib ma mi 'khor bar phyogs gcig tu 'dug na/ dgra'i dmag byin chen pos yul
phyogs de bcom par 'gyur/ skyed shing 'gro ba ltar snang na/ yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / skyed shing lhag par brjid cing gsal bar snang na/ yul
khams de'i rgyal po tshe thung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i lha mchod pa'i tshe lha smra'am/ 'dzum na/ rgyal po la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / me tog gi char 'bab
pa'am/ rlung dmar langs shing / gnam las srin bu bab na/ yul khams der chom rkun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i lha khang du me ma bus par du
ba byung zhing / lha yang mtshan dang cho 'phrul ston na/ rgyal po la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / 'jig rten pa'i lha khang du me mar ma bus par me mar 'dra bar snang
na| rgyal po'i gnang chen la bgegs dang / gnod pa 'byung / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ 'dod chags mi ldang na/ rgyal po'i pho brang mes tshig cing /
rgyal po la mi dge ba sna tshogs 'byung / char pa dang / ser ba 'bab la/ gnam la kha dog gsal ba dag byung na/ yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / grong
khyer tshub mas bskor cing 'gro ba dang / rlung dmar langs shing char pa khrag 'dra ba bab na/ yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / glog 'byung zhing char pa 'bab la/
sprin 'khor ling 'khor ling du chad de/ sprin 'khor ling du chad pa'i bar bar na/ dri za'i grong khyer 'dra ba snang na/ yul khams der 'jigs
pa chen po 'byung / zla ba dmar por gyur na/ yul khams der grong khyer mes tshig pa dang / rims kyis mi ngas par 'gyur/ zla ba'i mtha' dmar la dbus nag por
song na/ yul khams de 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur/ zla ba'i kha dog btsag 'dra bar dmar por snang la/ slar yang 'phral du dkar po'i rang bzhin du gyur na/ rlung mi
ldang bar drag por 'bab/ ri skam lta bur chu mig byung na/ lo tog legs par 'gyur/ me ma bus par yul khams der du ba byung na/ yul 'khor der 'jigs
pa chen po 'byung / mda' gzhu skyes kor la/ me'am/ dud pa byung na/ yul khams der dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo / /de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /
rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
rdzogs so// //
